questions.question: most published author at CVPR 2007
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t2.paperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t2.year  =  2007 AND t3.venuename  =  "CVPR" GROUP BY t1.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t2.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What is highest rating for the most recent movie and when was it released?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT max(T1.stars) ,  T2.year FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID WHERE T2.year  =  (SELECT max(YEAR) FROM Movie)

questions.question: top authors working on ImageNet ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.paperid FROM paperdataset AS t2 JOIN dataset AS t1 ON t2.datasetid  =  t1.datasetid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t1.datasetname  =  "ImageNet" GROUP BY t3.paperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: who is the most cited author at CVPR ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t1.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t3.venuename  =  "CVPR" GROUP BY t1.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: Who are the authors with the most published papers in syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: recent deep learning papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: Latest paper by oren etzioni
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "oren etzioni" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: What are the names of all reviewers that have rated 3 or more movies?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.name FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Reviewer AS T2 ON T1.rID  =  T2.rID GROUP BY T1.rID HAVING COUNT(*)  >=  3

questions.question: Return reviewer name, movie title, stars, and ratingDate. And sort the data first by reviewer name, then by movie title, and lastly by number of stars.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.stars ,  T1.ratingDate FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID JOIN Reviewer AS T3 ON T1.rID  =  T3.rID ORDER BY T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.stars

questions.question: most popular topics at NIPS 2015
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t1.keyphraseid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t3.year  =  2015 AND t4.venuename  =  "NIPS" GROUP BY t1.keyphraseid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: topics at ACL 2014
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t1.keyphraseid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t3.year  =  2014 AND t4.venuename  =  "ACL" GROUP BY t1.keyphraseid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: Find the name of companies that do not make DVD drive.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT name FROM manufacturers EXCEPT SELECT T2.name FROM products AS T1 JOIN manufacturers AS T2 ON T1.Manufacturer  =  T2.code WHERE T1.name  =  'DVD drive'

questions.question: hot topics at NIPS 2015
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t1.keyphraseid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t3.year  =  2015 AND t4.venuename  =  "NIPS" GROUP BY t1.keyphraseid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: who wrote the most papers on syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: number of papers by year from jamie callan
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t3.year FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "jamie callan" GROUP BY t3.year;

questions.question: latest deep learning papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: keyphrases used by Luke S Zettlemoyer for each year
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.keyphraseid  ,  t3.year FROM paper AS t3 JOIN paperkeyphrase AS t2 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Luke S Zettlemoyer" ORDER BY t3.year  ,  t2.keyphraseid;

questions.question: what is the biggest capital city in the us
questions.gold_sql: SELECT city_name FROM city WHERE population  =  ( SELECT MAX ( t1.population ) FROM state AS t2 JOIN city AS t1 ON t2.capital  =  t1.city_name );

questions.question: What journals are Takashi Matsumoto 's articles published in ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Takashi Matsumoto" GROUP BY t3.journalid;

questions.question: What are the names of all the reviewers and movie names?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT name FROM Reviewer UNION SELECT title FROM Movie

questions.question: Find the captain rank that has some captains in both Cutter and Armed schooner classes.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT rank FROM captain WHERE CLASS  =  'Cutter' INTERSECT SELECT rank FROM captain WHERE CLASS  =  'Armed schooner'

questions.question: Show all headquarters with both a company in banking industry and a company in Oil and gas.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT headquarters FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Banking' INTERSECT SELECT headquarters FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Oil and gas'

questions.question: who published the most in semantic parsing after 2005 ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "semantic parsing" AND t4.year  >  2005 GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what is the highest point in states bordering colorado
questions.gold_sql: SELECT highest_point FROM highlow WHERE state_name IN ( SELECT border FROM border_info WHERE state_name  =  "colorado" ) ORDER BY highest_elevation DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: What years did Pedro Domingos publish papers in ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.year FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Pedro Domingos" GROUP BY t3.year;

questions.question: how is the most cited author in CVPR ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t1.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t3.venuename  =  "CVPR" GROUP BY t1.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t4.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What is the paper about parsing of the most citation ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "parsing" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: How many papers were written on Multiuser Receiver in the Decision Feedback this year ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Multiuser Receiver in the Decision Feedback" AND t3.year  =  2016 GROUP BY t3.paperid HAVING COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.keyphrasename )  >  1;

questions.question: What are the ids of all reviewers who did not give 4 stars?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT rID FROM Rating EXCEPT SELECT rID FROM Rating WHERE stars  =  4

questions.question: List prominent scholars in syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What year did Ye Cao publish the most papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.paperid )  ,  t3.year FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname LIKE "Ye Cao" GROUP BY t3.year ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What are the first names of the faculty members playing both Canoeing and Kayaking?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.lname FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Faculty_participates_in AS T2 ON T1.facID  =  T2.facID JOIN activity AS T3 ON T2.actid  =  T2.actid WHERE T3.activity_name  =  'Canoeing' INTERSECT SELECT T1.lname FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Faculty_participates_in AS T2 ON T1.facID  =  T2.facID JOIN activity AS T3 ON T2.actid  =  T2.actid WHERE T3.activity_name  =  'Kayaking'

questions.question: topics popular at NIPS 2015
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t1.keyphraseid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t3.year  =  2015 AND t4.venuename  =  "NIPS" GROUP BY t1.keyphraseid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: which state capital has the smallest population
questions.gold_sql: SELECT city_name FROM city WHERE population  =  ( SELECT MIN ( t1.population ) FROM state AS t2 JOIN city AS t1 ON t2.capital  =  t1.city_name );

questions.question: What is the name of the activity that has the most faculty members involved in?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.activity_name FROM Activity AS T1 JOIN Faculty_participates_in AS T2 ON T1.actID  =  T2.actID GROUP BY T1.actID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: What are the headquarters that have both a company in the banking and 'oil and gas' industries?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT headquarters FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Banking' INTERSECT SELECT headquarters FROM company WHERE main_industry  =  'Oil and gas'

questions.question: Find the last name and gender of the students who are playing both Call of Destiny and Works of Widenius games.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT lname ,  sex FROM Student WHERE StuID IN (SELECT T1.StuID FROM Plays_games AS T1 JOIN Video_games AS T2 ON T1.GameID  =  T2.GameID WHERE T2.Gname  =  "Call of Destiny" INTERSECT SELECT T1.StuID FROM Plays_games AS T1 JOIN Video_games AS T2 ON T1.GameID  =  T2.GameID WHERE T2.Gname  =  "Works of Widenius")

questions.question: What are the latest papers by oren etzioni ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "oren etzioni" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: Find the name of the ships that have more than one captain.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.name FROM ship AS t1 JOIN captain AS t2 ON t1.ship_id  =  t2.ship_id GROUP BY t2.ship_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

questions.question: number of ACL papers by author
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t2.paperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t3.venuename  =  "ACL" GROUP BY t1.authorid;

questions.question: Show ids of students who play video game and play sports.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT StuID FROM Sportsinfo INTERSECT SELECT StuID FROM Plays_games

questions.question: What is the highest cited paper by ohad shamir ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paper AS t3 JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "ohad shamir" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What are the ids of all female students who play football?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT StuID FROM Student WHERE sex  =  'F' INTERSECT SELECT StuID FROM Sportsinfo WHERE sportname  =  "Football"

questions.question: Show all game names played by at least 1000 hours.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT gname FROM Plays_games AS T1 JOIN Video_games AS T2 ON T1.gameid  =  T2.gameid GROUP BY T1.gameid HAVING sum(hours_played)  >=  1000

questions.question: which venue publishes the most papers about deep learning
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t3.paperid )  ,  t4.venueid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" GROUP BY t4.venueid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What was oren etzioni 's latest paper ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "oren etzioni" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: what author is most cited ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorname  ,  COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN cite AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid GROUP BY t1.authorname ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: how many ACL 2012 papers have more than 7 citations ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT ( t1.paperid )  ,  COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t1.year  =  2012 AND t2.venuename  =  "ACL" GROUP BY t1.paperid HAVING COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid )  >  7;

questions.question: what is the capital of the state with the highest elevation
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.capital FROM highlow AS t2 JOIN state AS t1 ON t1.state_name  =  t2.state_name WHERE t2.highest_elevation  =  ( SELECT MAX ( highest_elevation ) FROM highlow );

questions.question: For the oldest movie listed, what is its average rating and title?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT avg(T1.stars) ,  T2.title FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID WHERE T2.year  =  (SELECT min(YEAR) FROM Movie)

questions.question: What are the names of reviewers who had rated 3 star and 4 star?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.name FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Reviewer AS T2 ON T1.rID  =  T2.rID WHERE T1.stars  =  3 INTERSECT SELECT T2.name FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Reviewer AS T2 ON T1.rID  =  T2.rID WHERE T1.stars  =  4

questions.question: Tell me the first and last name of the student who has the most activities.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM Student AS T1 JOIN Participates_in AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.StuID GROUP BY T1.StuID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: what state that borders oklahoma has the highest population
questions.gold_sql: SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE state_name IN ( SELECT border FROM border_info WHERE state_name  =  "oklahoma" ) ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: Who has written the most papers at chi ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.paperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t3.venuename  =  "chi" GROUP BY t1.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what is the population of the capital of the largest state through which the mississippi runs
questions.gold_sql: SELECT population FROM city WHERE city_name  =  ( SELECT capital FROM state WHERE area  =  ( SELECT MAX ( t1.area ) FROM state AS t1 JOIN river AS t2 ON t1.state_name  =  t2.traverse WHERE t2.river_name  =  "mississippi" ) );

questions.question: How many citations does luke zettlemoyer have per year
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid )  ,  t3.year FROM paper AS t3 JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "luke zettlemoyer" GROUP BY t3.year;

questions.question: top author in syntactic parsing
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What are the name and phone of the customer with the most ordered product quantity?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT  T1.customer_name ,  T1.customer_phone FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id JOIN order_items AS T3 ON T3.order_id  =  T2.order_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id ORDER BY sum(T3.order_quantity) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: Give me the the first and last name of the faculty who advises the most students.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Student AS T2 ON T1.FacID  =  T2.advisor GROUP BY T1.FacID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: Who writes a lot of papers in Machine Learning ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorname FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t4 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t4.keyphraseid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t3.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t4.keyphrasename  =  "Machine Learning" GROUP BY t1.authorname ORDER BY COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what is ohad shamir 's most cited paper ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paper AS t3 JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "ohad shamir" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What is the maximum stars and year for the most recent movie?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT max(T1.stars) ,  T2.year FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID WHERE T2.year  =  (SELECT max(YEAR) FROM Movie)

questions.question: Find the average rating star for each movie that are not reviewed by Brittany Harris.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT mID ,  avg(stars) FROM Rating WHERE mID NOT IN (SELECT T1.mID FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Reviewer AS T2 ON T1.rID  =  T2.rID WHERE T2.name  =  "Brittany Harris") GROUP BY mID

questions.question: who wrote the most papers for CVPR 2007
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t2.paperid )  ,  t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t2.year  =  2007 AND t3.venuename  =  "CVPR" GROUP BY t1.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t2.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What is the most popular paper this year in CVPR ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t1.year  =  2016 AND t2.venuename  =  "CVPR" GROUP BY t3.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What is the most cited paper at sigcomm ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t2.venuename  =  "sigcomm" GROUP BY t3.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what are the parsing papers that have the most citations ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "parsing" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: Current research on deep learning
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: what is the largest capital city in the usa
questions.gold_sql: SELECT city_name FROM city WHERE population  =  ( SELECT MAX ( t1.population ) FROM state AS t2 JOIN city AS t1 ON t2.capital  =  t1.city_name );

questions.question: most cited EMNLP 2010 papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t3.citedpaperid ) FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t1.year  =  2010 AND t2.venuename  =  "EMNLP" GROUP BY t3.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t3.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: newest deep learning papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: What are some recent papers written in deep learning ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: Show the names of customers who use Credit Card payment method and have more than 2 orders.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.customer_name FROM customers AS T1 JOIN customer_orders AS T2 ON T1.customer_id  =  T2.customer_id WHERE T1.payment_method_code  =  'Credit Card' GROUP BY T1.customer_id HAVING count(*)  >  2

questions.question: who published the most in syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: who has the most publications in syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what is the longest river in the state with the highest point
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.river_name FROM highlow AS t2 JOIN river AS t1 ON t1.traverse  =  t2.state_name WHERE t2.highest_elevation  =  ( SELECT MAX ( highest_elevation ) FROM highlow ) ORDER BY t1.length DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: What are the code and description of the least frequent detention type ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.detention_type_code ,  T2.detention_type_description FROM Detention AS T1 JOIN Ref_Detention_Type AS T2 ON T1.detention_type_code  =  T2.detention_type_code GROUP BY T1.detention_type_code ORDER BY count(*) ASC LIMIT 1

questions.question: what is capital of the state with the lowest point
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.capital FROM highlow AS t2 JOIN state AS t1 ON t1.state_name  =  t2.state_name WHERE t2.lowest_elevation  =  ( SELECT MIN ( lowest_elevation ) FROM highlow ) ;

questions.question: which of the states bordering oklahoma has the largest population
questions.gold_sql: SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE state_name IN ( SELECT border FROM border_info WHERE state_name  =  "oklahoma" ) ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: List the journals related to Temporal Data
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Temporal Data" GROUP BY t3.journalid;

questions.question: Fetch me the most cited publications for Artificial Intelligence
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citingpaperid ) FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Artificial Intelligence" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: top syntactic parsing author
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: what papers have fewer than 5 citations by ACL papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.citingpaperid FROM paper AS t1 JOIN cite AS t3 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t2 ON t2.venueid  =  t1.venueid WHERE t2.venuename  =  "ACL" GROUP BY t3.citingpaperid HAVING COUNT ( DISTINCT t3.citedpaperid )  <  5;

questions.question: parsing top papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "parsing" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: recent research interests of sanjeev arora
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.keyphrasename  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t5 ON t4.authorid  =  t5.authorid WHERE t5.authorname  =  "sanjeev arora" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: Find the movies with the highest average rating. Return the movie titles and average rating.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.title ,  avg(T1.stars) FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID GROUP BY T1.mID ORDER BY avg(T1.stars) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: what is the capital of the state with the highest point
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.capital FROM highlow AS t2 JOIN state AS t1 ON t1.state_name  =  t2.state_name WHERE t2.highest_elevation  =  ( SELECT MAX ( highest_elevation ) FROM highlow );

questions.question: what was the first deep learning paper ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.datasetid  ,  t4.year FROM paperdataset AS t3 JOIN dataset AS t2 ON t3.datasetid  =  t2.datasetid JOIN paperkeyphrase AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN keyphrase AS t5 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t5.keyphraseid WHERE t5.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t4.year ASC;

questions.question: What is the reviewer name, film title, movie rating, and rating date  for every movie ordered by reviewer name, movie title, then finally rating?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.stars ,  T1.ratingDate FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID JOIN Reviewer AS T3 ON T1.rID  =  T3.rID ORDER BY T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.stars

questions.question: Show the game name that has most number of hours played.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT gname FROM Plays_games AS T1 JOIN Video_games AS T2 ON T1.gameid  =  T2.gameid GROUP BY T1.gameid ORDER BY sum(hours_played) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: which journal did Donald E Knuth publish his last paper ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid  ,  t3.year FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Donald E Knuth" GROUP BY t3.journalid  ,  t3.year ORDER BY t3.year DESC;

questions.question: What is the name of the activity with the most students?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.activity_name FROM Activity AS T1 JOIN Participates_in AS T2 ON T1.actID  =  T2.actID GROUP BY T1.actID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: Show the ids for all the students who participate in an activity and are under 20.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT StuID FROM Participates_in INTERSECT SELECT StuID FROM Student WHERE age  <  20

questions.question: Find the titles of all movies not reviewed by Chris Jackson.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT title FROM Movie EXCEPT SELECT T2.title FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID JOIN Reviewer AS T3 ON T1.rID  =  T3.rID WHERE T3.name  =  'Chris Jackson'

questions.question: who is the most published author in syntactic parsing ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: who has written the most syntactic parsing papers ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.paperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "syntactic parsing" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.paperid ) DESC;

questions.question: how high is the highest point in the largest state
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t2.highest_elevation FROM highlow AS t2 JOIN state AS t1 ON t1.state_name  =  t2.state_name WHERE t1.area  =  ( SELECT MAX ( area ) FROM state );

questions.question: In 2010 what journal published an article about Trophic Cascade ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Trophic Cascade" AND t3.year  =  2010 GROUP BY t3.journalid;

questions.question: What are the ids of all male students who do not play football?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT StuID FROM Student WHERE sex  =  'M' EXCEPT SELECT StuID FROM Sportsinfo WHERE sportname  =  "Football"

questions.question: Show me some recent papers on deep learning ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid  ,  t3.year FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "deep learning" ORDER BY t3.year DESC;
